title: Chapter 9 â€“ Practice: Lists, Tuples, and Dictionaries
description: Hands-on missions for chapter 9 using lists, tuples, and dictionaries to store, update, and print collections of data.

solution.notes: Learner should create a list, use indexing to access first/last items, append a new item, and loop over the list to print each item with a label.
Learner should store start and target positions in tuples, access coordinates by index, and print them in readable sentences.
Learner should create a player dict with name, level, and score, update the score, and print a summary sentence using an f-string.

practices.title: Mission: High Score Table (List of Dicts)

solution.notes: Learner should extend a list of player dictionaries, then loop through and print each player's name and score in a formatted way.
